channel.title: PK Castle Development Team
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]Welcome to the PK Castle Development Team's Offical Topic[/size][/center]
[i]This server is going to be huge. What will happen, is you will start out in a training area and you will do a huge quest. The biggest quest ever made in Moparscape, can't release anymore information due to leachers! I am looking for the following type people for my staff:[/i]
[i][b]Please Note:[/b]The way the team works is that for coders, Once we start the project I will bring in the necessary coders to finish a step of the proccess, then I will call in the other coders, ect. Testers will not be contacted untill the server is compeletly finished. The Testers are the Offical ones, because I will call in some people just to try it out, but the offical testers get the final call on the release date. Forum creaters will start as soon as the coders start, they will work hard to create the forums, and the forum testers and moderators will not be called until the forum is finished! Rich Dude99's MSN is: erbeeler@hotmail.com[/i]
[center][b]Important People/ Head Developers:[/b]Rich Dude99, Pk3r Kyle (These people can accept and decline applications)[/center]
[u][b]Coders;[/b][/u] [b]Shop Coder(s):[/b] OPEN, OPEN [b]NPC Diaglouge Coder(s):[/b] OPEN, OPEN [b]Weapon Specials Coder(s):[/b] OPEN [b]NPC Drop Coder(s):[/b] kristo 21 [b]Global Object/ Object Cases Coder(s):[/b] OPEN, OPEN [b]All Around Coder(s):[/b] Rich Dude99, Pk3r Kyle, OPEN
[u][b]Offical Testers;[/b][/u] [b]Bug Testers:[/b]OPEN, OPEN [b]Quest Testers:[/b] w00tz0r pwnz, OPEN [b]All Around Testers:[/b]cotyg123, OPEN, OPEN
[u][b]Forum Staff;[/b][/u] [b]Forum Creators:[/b] Rich Dude99, Pk3r Kyle [b]Forum Testers:[/b] OPEN, OPEN [b]Moderators:[/b]1234ideclareathumbwar, rob1601
[u][b]Client Staff;[/b][/u] [b]Client Creators:[/b] Pk3r Kyle
[u][b]Application Formats;[/b][/u]
[b]Coders;[/b] [code][b]Forum Name:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of coder:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN:[/b] [b]Have you read the "Please Note" text at the top:[/b][/code]
[b]Offical Testers[/b] [code][b]Forum Name:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of tester:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN:[/b] [b]Have you read the "Please Note" text at the top:[/b][/code]
[b]Forum Maker[/b] [code][b]Forum Name:[/b] [b]Desired In-Game/Forum Name:[/b] [b]Applying for what kind of forum staff:[/b] [b]Experience:[/b] [b]Why did you decide to apply for this:[/b] [b]Anything else:[/b] [b]Whats your MSN:[/b] [b]Have you read the "Please Note" text at the top:[/b][/code]
If you are a staff member, put this in your signature: [code][b]Proud Member of the PK Castle Dev Team![/b][/code]

item.title: PK Castle Development Team
item.dc:creator: @_Raith †Raith†
item.description:
@_Raith wrote:

Forum Name:Raith
Desired In-Game/Forum Name:Raith
Applying for what kind of coder:Global Object &/or All Around Coder
Experience:I love doing global objects adding and deleting etc. I work for hours getting everything in the right spot. Im sort of a freak when it comes to perfection. Thats what makes me think I can do a great job as all around coder as well
Why did you decide to apply for this:Well I spent a lot of time adding global objects to make a server unique and my host (not aload to port forward) screwed me and took it over.
Anything else:I am home schooled so I am home during the day to get things done at a more rapid pace. I would be honored in helping this out and I wouldnt let you down.
Whats your MSN:es_sk8ter11@hotmail.com
Have you read the “Please Note” text at the top:yes I have

Read full topic

Forum Name: pk3r kyle

Applying for what kind of coder: shop coder,forum builder and a bug finder
Experience: err ill post some in a min
Why did you decide to apply for this: its the easiest out of the lot so i can get it over and done with for you
Anything else: ill bug test aswell and also make your forums with you
Have you read the “Please Note” text at the top: yes[/quote] I saw the client you posted for Zoltan. It was awesome!! You should use that for this one.

Read full topic

[center][size=15pt]Welcome to the PK Castle Development Team’s Offical Topic[/size][/center]

This server is going to be huge. What will happen, is you will start out in a training area and you will do a huge quest. The biggest quest ever made in Moparscape, can’t release anymore information due to leachers! I am looking for the following type people for my staff:

Please Note:The way the team works is that for coders, Once we start the project I will bring in the necessary coders to finish a step of the proccess, then I will call in the other coders, ect. Testers will not be contacted untill the server is compeletly finished. The Testers are the Offical ones, because I will call in some people just to try it out, but the offical testers get the final call on the release date. Forum creaters will start as soon as the coders start, they will work hard to create the forums, and the forum testers and moderators will not be called until the forum is finished!
